titles.title: I'm Free To Walk Upon The Highest Mountains There May Be

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm free to walk upon the highest mountains there may be.
I'm free to place my feet upon the land and on the sea.
I'm free to manifest the very image that I am,
I'm free but I'm not loose in His kingdom I now stand.
So good to be free! No earthly kingdom has a hold on me.
My heavenly Father, He dwells in me.
O, praise the Lord! It's good to be free.
